reference.title: euca-describe-customer-gateways
reference.shortdesc: Shows information about VPN customer gateways.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euca-describe-customer-gateways [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--filter NAME=VALUE] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] [VPC [VPC ...]]

row.entry: Limit results to one or more supplied customer gateway IDs.

section.title: Available Filters
section.p: You can add filters to your request so that the response includes information for only certain customer gateways. For example, you can use a filter to return only the customer gateway that has a specific ID. Some tips for using filters with this command:

ul.li: You can use multiple values for a filter. Eucalyptus responds with information for a customer gateway only if it matches at least one of the filter values that you specified.

You can use multiple filters. For example, you can specify customer gateways that have a specific tag. Eucalyptus responds with the information for a customer gateway only if it matches all the filters that you specified. If there is no match, Eucalyptus returns an empty response.

You can use wildcards in a filter value. Use an asterisk (*) to match zero or more characters. Use a question mark (?) to match exactly one character. To escape special characters, use a backslash (\) before the character. For example, a value of \*eucalyptus\?\\ searches for the literal string *eucalyptus?\.

section.p: The following are the available filters for euca-describe-customer-gateways:

row.entry: ID of the customer gateway's cloud-facing interface
The state of the customer gateway
key of a tag assigned to the customer gateway
value of a tag assigned to the customer gateway

section.title: Example
section.p: The following example describes all customer gateways for an account.
This command will return output similar to the following:
section.codeblock: CUSTOMERGATEWAY cgw-a16d0fff ATTACHMENT vpc-aa87a81b available CUSTOMERGATEWAY cgw-a5f11fff ATTACHMENT vpc-72ad7f86 available
